sil-desc: A [https://semantic-mediawiki.org Semantic MediaWiki] extension to create and manage interlanguage links
smw-pa-property-predefined__sil_containe: "$1" is a predefined property (also known as [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Special_properties special property]) that collects language related meta information about a page and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Interlanguage_Links Semantic Interlanguage Links] extension.
sil-interlanguagelink-hideinterlanguagel: The parser function cannot be used because $wgHideInterlanguageLinks is set.
sil-interlanguagelink-invalidlanguagecod: "$1" was not recognized as valid language code.
sil-interlanguagelink-multiplecalls: The "INTERLANGUAGELINK" parser function was called muliple times on this page which is not possible.
sil-interlanguagelink-languagetargetcomb: The combination "$1":"$2" already exists for page "$3" therefore no additional interlanguage annotation was created.
sil-interlanguagelist-missing-linkrefere: The parser function is missing a valid reference.
sil-interlanguagelist-missing-template: The parser function is missing an output template.
sil-interlanguageparser-linkreference-er: The parser function had a problem to create a title object from "$1".
sil-categorypage-languagefilter-active: This category contains information (page, subcategory, and image) that is filtered by language.
